sourcesContent:
export const SnackbarMessages = {
    DEFAULT_ERROR_MSG: 'Something went Wrong !!',
    LOGIN_SUCCESS_MSG: 'Login Successfully Done',
    BLANK_CALL_SUCCESS_MSG: 'Blank Call Tagged Successfully',
    FEEDBACK_SUCCESS_MSG: 'Feedback Saved Sucessfully !!',
    CALL_DROP_SUCCESS_MSG: 'Call Drop Tagged successfully',
    FETCH_CALL_DROP_SUCCESS_MSG: 'Fetching Call drop Details',
    SCENARIO_NOT_FOUND: 'Scenario data not available',
    CURRENT_SCENARIO_ID_NOT_FOUND: 'Scenario id not available',
    SCENARIO_STEP_ID_NOT_FOUND: 'Scenario step id not identified',
    CUSTOMER_NOT_FOUND: 'Customer data not found',
    INVOICE_NOT_FOUND: 'No invoice found for customer.',
    DATA_NOT_AVAILABLE: 'Data not available',
    DATA_NOT_CONFIGURED: 'Data not configured.',
    INVALID_INPUTE_DATE: 'Invalid Date Entered',
    SMS_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: 'sms sent successfully',
    CALL_TRANSFER_SUCCESS_MSG: 'Call Transfer Done',
    TASK_FIELDS_NOT_FOUND: 'Task Fields not available.',
    LOGIN_FAILURE: 'Login failed.',
    DUPLICATE_CALL_TRANSFER: 'Call Transfer Tagging already Done Successfully !!',
    DUPLICATE_FTR: 'FTR already tagged Successfully !!',
    DUPLICATE_SR: 'SR already tagged Successfully !!',
    DUPLICATE_BLANK_CALL: 'Blank Call already tagged Successfully !!',
    SELECT_DND_CATEGORY: 'Please select category.',
    DUPLICATE_DROP_CALL: 'Drop Call already tagged Successfully !!',
    DUPLICATE_DROP_CALL_SCENARIO: 'Drop Call already tagged Successfully from scenario !!',
    LOGOUT_SUCCESS: 'Logout Successfully Done !!',
    INVALID_DFF: 'Please enter valid data.',
    ARC_ISSUE_SUCCESS_MSG: 'Your registered request number is',
    DEFAULT_ARC_ISSUE_SUCCESS_MSG: 'Arc done successfully',
    DEFAULT_ARC_EMAIL_SUCCESS_MSG: 'Email Sent Successfully',
    PROBLEMATIC_ADDRESS_NOT_FOUND: 'Please enter problematic address.',
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER_NOT_FOUND: "Account Number not found",
    SR_NUMBER_NOT_FOUND: "SR Data could not be fetched",
    INVALID_SR_NUMBER: "Invalid SR Number",
    INVALID_LSI_NUMBER: "Invalid LSI Number",
    INVALID_ACCOUNT_NUMBER: "Invalid Account Number",
    CUSTOMER_NOT_FOUND_OPTIMUS: "Customer Details Not found in Optimus",

    // arc dialog api error messages
    ARC_LOCATION_ERROR_MSG: 'Unable to fetch Arc Location',
    ARC_CHANNEL_ERROR_MSG: 'Unable to fetch Arc Channel',
    ARC_CIRCLE_ERROR_MSG: 'Unable to fetch Arc Circle',
    ARC_TYPE_ERROR_MSG: 'Unable to fetch Arc Type',
    ARC_SUBTYPE_ERROR_MSG: 'Unable to fetch Arc subtype',
    ARC_STORE_TYPE_ERROR_MSG: 'Unable to fetch Arc Store type',
    ARC_STORE_NAME_ADDR_ERROR_MSG: 'Unable to fetch Arc Store name address',
    ARC_CITY_ERROR_MSG: 'Unable to fetch Arc City',
    ARC_VOC_ERROR_MSG: 'Unable to fetch Arc VOC',
    DEFAULT_VOC_OBJECT_ERROR_MSG: 'Unable to fetch Arc selected voc data',
    DEFAULT_STORE_OBJECT_ERROR_MSG: 'Unable to fetch Arc selected Store data',
    DEFAULT_CALL_DROP_SCENARIO: 'Call Drop',

    // sms dialog
    SMS_DIALOG_NO_LOCATION_SEARCH_QUERY_ENTERED: 'Please enter a location to search',
    SMS_DIALOG_NO_LOCATIONS_SELECTED_ERROR: 'Please select atleast one location and submit',
    SMS_DIALOG_NO_CATEGORY_SELECTED_ERROR: 'Please select an sms category',
    SMS_DIALOG_NO_TMPL_SELECTED_ERROR: 'Please select one template and submit',
    SMS_DIALOG_NO_SELF_CARE_MESSAGES: 'No Self care messages found for this scenario',
    SMS_DIALOG_NO_SELF_CARE_MSG_SELECTED_ERROR: 'Please select atleast one message and submit',

    //plan and usage details tab
    USAGE_DETAILS_NO_DATA: 'No data found for Plan and Usage Details',
    USAGE_ADD_ON_DETAILS_NO_DATA: 'No data found for Plan and Usage Details Add On',

    UTILIZATION_NO_DATA: 'No data found for Utilization',
    LSI_PING_NO_DATA: 'No data found for Lsi Ping Status',
    LSI_PING_DATA_COPIED_TO_CLIPBOARD: 'LSI ping status data copied to clipboard',
    //for arc form 
    ARC_VALIDATION_ERROR_MSG: 'Fill All the required fields',
    //for payment details card
    PAYMENT_DETAILS_NO_DATA: 'No data found for Payment Details',
    ACCOUNT_NUMBER_NOT_FOUND_OPTIMUS: 'Account Number not found in Optimus',

    SR_TASK_UPDATED_SUCCESSFULLY : 'SR Task Updated Successfully'
};
